title: Hide old environment indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into WBC

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-58
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the top left hand corner
custom_expected:
THEN there will be only one environment indicator
AND it will be inside the WBC pinwheel Logo

title: As a user, I want to be reminded when I have unsaved changes on a page and attempt to leave the page so that I don't lose my changes.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in to WBC
AND is on a page with unsaved changes

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-57

Design
https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz
custom_steps: WHEN navigating away from that page
custom_expected:
THEN display a modal.
AND the modal should use the language that's in the design.
AND clicking "save changes" will save the changes from the page, close the modal, throw a green success notification "Saved" and navigate the user to where they were trying to go.
AND clicking "discard changes" will discard the changes and take the user to where they originally tried to navigate.

title: As a BOC admin or Federation Admin, I want the ability to add a player to a team's interest list.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC or Fed Admin

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-61

Design
https://zpl.io/VOx9Ndl
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Prospective Player List
AND clicking the add to interest list icon,
custom_expected:
THEN add the player to the team's interest list
AND if adding this player will exceed the number of players allowed on the interest list, display a modal to the user.
AND a continue button which will close the modal.

title: As a BOC admin, I want to view all Federation Teams' interest lists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-60

Design
https://zpl.io/a3j5Oyy
custom_expected:
THEN display a dropdown that enables the user to select a federation team. Only teams in the current tournament should be visible in the list
AND display the maximum number of allowed interest list players from the roster settings
AND display a list of players who have been added to the interest list by the federation with the following:
 1. A stoplight icon (no functionality as part of this story)
 2. Last name
 3. First name
 4. Position
 5. Org
 6. Club
 7. A docs icon (no functionality as part of this story)
 8. Eligibility status (no functionality as part of this story)
 9. IL Flag
10. 40 man flag

title: As a federation admin, I want to view my team's interest list.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Federation Admin

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-60

Design
https://zpl.io/a3j5Oyy
custom_expected:
THEN this tab should be visible to Federation Users of any type
AND at the top of the page, display a heading that says "Interest List" with the country flag to the left of the words
AND display the maximum number of allowed interest list players from the roster settings
AND display a list of players who have been added to the interest list by the federation with the following:
1. A stoplight icon (no functionality as part of this story)
2. Last name
3. First name
4. Position
5. Org
6. Club
7. A docs icon (no functionality as part of this story)
8. Eligibility status (no functionality as part of this story)
9. IL Flag
10. 40 man flag

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to control the roster limits for a tournament so that rosters are abiding by the tournament rules.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin





Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-9

Design
https://zpl.io/aw6oonM
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the settings page
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a section called "General Roster Settings"
AND the section will have an expand/collapse icon. Clicking should expand/collapse as appropriate.
AND the section should be expanded by default.
AND the section should contain the following setting.
-Federation Interest List Max Players
-Default value is 50
-Only numerical values are allowed
AND when the form has changed, display an asterisk at the top of the page next to the year (https://zpl.io/brMkBAO) and activate the save and cancel buttons.
AND clicking save saves the settings and displays the green "saved" notification on the page (https://zpl.io/awJd8oM)
AND clicking cancel reverts the settings back to their previous values and makes the form "clean" again.

title: UI Styling Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user if viewing the Federation Teams Page

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-62
custom_steps: WHEN hovering over the trophy icon
custom_expected:
THEN the icon should say "Tournaments"
AND the section title on the Federation Teams page should read "Tournament(x)"
AND the hover color on the side and top nav(user dropdown arrow) should be a lighter blue.  #4c8cee

title: Styling for the user dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into WBC

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-63
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the username or arrow in the top right hand corner
custom_expected:
THEN a popover with a Sign Out link will open
AND the popover should appear directly beneath the arrow.  It's currently left aligned with the username.

title: UX Improvement for Add Federation Teams Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the "Add Federation Teams" modal

Story
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WBCP-64
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the teams in the drop down
custom_expected:
THEN hitting enter when teams have been selected in the multi-select and the dropdown list should act the same way as using the mouse to click save
AND while typing to search for countries the user should be able to use the arrow keys to scroll the dropdown list
